home.title: IIIF Authentication API 2.0 Demo
home.description: This demo implements the IIIF Authentication API 2.0 specification

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.step1: Click "Authenticate" below or use the Login button in the header
gettingStarted.step3: Visit any viewer page to see protected IIIF content

home.authenticateDescription: Click to open IIIF authentication flow
home.authWindow: Authentication window should open. Use credentials: user/pass

viewers.authRequired: Authentication required. A login window should have opened.

miradorViewer.title: Mirador IIIF Viewer
miradorViewer.notAuthMessage: Not authenticated - images may not load

jwtDebug.title: JWT Debug Tool
jwtDebug.signatureNote: Note: Signature verification requires the server's secret key
jwtDebug.noToken: No authentication token found. Please authenticate first.
jwtDebug.jwtIoNote: Note: jwt.io will show 'signature verification failed' because it doesn't have access to our server's secret key. This is normal and expected.

infoJsonDebug.title: IIIF Image API info.json Debug
infoJsonDebug.enterImageIdMessage: Enter an image ID and click "Load info.json" to see the IIIF Image Information response

probeDebug.title: Probe Service Debug
probeDebug.label: Label
probeDebug.clickToTest: Click "Call Probe Service" to test the authentication probe endpoint

tokenDebug.title: Token Service Debug
tokenDebug.clickGenerate: Click "Generate URL" to create the URL
tokenDebug.waitingPostMessage: Waiting for postMessage response from Token Service...
tokenDebug.step1: Client opens Token Service URL in a popup window
tokenDebug.step2: Token Service checks if there's a valid token:
tokenDebug.step2a: If yes: Returns HTML with postMessage script
tokenDebug.step2b: If no: Redirects to login page
tokenDebug.step3: After successful login, Token Service sends token via postMessage
tokenDebug.step4: Parent window receives the message and closes the popup
tokenDebug.redirected: Redirected to login page (no valid token). In a real scenario, this would open the login form.
tokenDebug.parseError: Could not parse postMessage data from response. This might happen if the token format is unexpected.
tokenDebug.noPostMessage: No postMessage found in response. The response might be in an unexpected format.
tokenDebug.popupBlocked: Popup blocked. Please allow popups for this site.
tokenDebug.timeout: Timeout waiting for response from Token Service

footer.title: IIIF Authentication API 2.0 Demo
footer.description: This is a demonstration of the IIIF Authentication API 2.0 specification.
